li.a: Dep. Supt. of Academics and Leadership

div.h5: Report Card to Help Families, Communities

div.p: Thank you all for working with us during these unusual circumstances. Please do not hesitate to contact us if your needs are not being met. It is our goal to reach ALL of our students while we fight this battle against the spread of the Coronavirus. Together we can overcome this, and we will, if we continue to support each other as a team.

div.div: 102 Maddox Rd | P.O. Box 50 Avon, MS 38723 | Phone 662-335-7186 | Fax 662-378-2285
